DESCRIPTION: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to an instrument degradation
Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to a processing degradation
Line counter since last auto-calibration sequence. If calibration enabled then it runs from 0 to 39 else from 0 to 8191 followed by 0 to 8191 and so on
Scan type code (0 = Earth view, 1 = space view, 2 = cold BB view, 3 = warm BB view, 4 = else.
Noise-Equivalent Delta N and Channel Quality Flags
Radiances for 56 pixel values of a scan line in the 20 channels. Earth scan pixel values are calibrated to radiances (channel 1 - 19) and reflectance factors (channel 20)

Angular relationships: solar zenith angle, satellite zenith angle, solar azimuth angle, satellite azimuth angle (FOV 1 to 56) Note: azimuth angle range is -180 to +180, where minus is west and plus is east.
Primary Calibration Second Order Term a2 (ch. 1-20)
Primary Calibration First Order Term a1 (ch. 1-20)
Primary Calibration Zeroth Order Term a0 (ch. 1-20)
Percentage of sky that is clear of clouds
